languages.text: "Даргонус подвергся массивной атаке ксеносов. Сопротивление флота было сломлено в считанные часы, после чего начался планетарный рейд. Силам обороны удалось удержать внутренние периметры нескольких городов, две атаки захлебнулись на подступах к населенным пунктам, но сражения все еще продолжаются — в том числе и здесь, в династическом дворце фон Валанциус".

"Dargonus has been hit by a mass xenos attack. The fleet's resistance was broken in mere hours, then the invaders commenced a planetary raid. The planetary defence forces were able to hold the inner perimeters of several cities, two of the attacks were stifled on the approaches to settlements, but the fights continue — here as well, in the von Valancius palace."
languages.original_text: "Даргонус подвергся массивной атаке ксеносов. Сопротивление флота было сломлено в считанные часы, после чего начался планетарный рейд. Силам обороны удалось удержать внутренние периметры нескольких городов, две атаки захлебнулись на подступах к населенным пунктам, но сражения все еще продолжаются — в том числе и здесь, в династическом дворце фон Валанциус".

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus has been hit by a mass xenos attack. The navy's resistance was broken in mere hours, then the invaders commenced a planetary raid. The Planetary Defense Forces were able to hold the inner perimeters of several cities, two of the attacks were stifled on the approaches to settlements, but the fights continue — here as well, in the von Valancius dynasty palace."

"Dargonus has been hit by a mass xenos attack. The navy's resistance was broken in mere hours, then the invaders commenced a planetary raid. The Planetary Defense Forces were able to hold the inner perimeters of several cities, two of the attacks were stifled on the approaches to settlements, but the fights continue — here as well, in the von Valancius dynasty palace."

"Dargonus has been hit by a mass xenos attack. The fleet's resistance was broken in mere hours, then the invaders commenced a planetary raid. The Planetary Defence Forces were able to hold the inner perimeters of several cities, two of the attacks were stifled on the approaches to settlements, but the fights continue — here as well, in the von Valancius palace."

"Dargonus has been hit by a mass xenos attack. The fleet's resistance was broken in mere hours, then the invaders commenced a planetary raid. The Planetary Defence Forces were able to hold the inner perimeters of several cities, two of the attacks were stifled on the approaches to settlements, but the fights continue — here as well, in the von Valancius palace."

"Dargonus has been hit by a mass xenos attack. The fleet's resistance was broken in mere hours, then the invaders commenced a planetary raid. The planetary defence forces were able to hold the inner perimeters of several cities, two of the attacks were stifled on the approaches to settlements, but the fights continue — here as well, in the von Valancius palace."

languages.text: 「ダルゴヌスは異種族の大群に襲撃されました。艦隊の抵抗は虚しくも数時間で破れ、インヴェイダーどもは惑星全体を襲いました。惑星防衛軍はいくつかの都市の内周を守り、襲撃のふたつは居住地の手前で食い止められましたが、依然として戦いは続いています――ここ、フォン・ヴァランシウス宮廷も例外ではありません」
languages.original_text: "Dargonus has been hit by a mass xenos attack. The fleet's resistance was broken in mere hours, then the invaders commenced a planetary raid. The planetary defence forces were able to hold the inner perimeters of several cities, two of the attacks were stifled on the approaches to settlements, but the fights continue — here as well, in the von Valancius palace."

traits.locale_text: 「ダルゴヌスは異種族の大群に襲撃されました。艦隊の抵抗は虚しくも数時間で破れ、インヴェイダーどもは惑星全体を襲いました。惑星防衛軍はいくつかの都市の内周を守り、襲撃のふたつは居住地の手前で食い止められましたが、依然として戦いは続いています――ここ、フォン・ヴァランシウス宮廷も例外ではありません」

languages.text: “达戈努斯遭到了异形的大规模袭击。入侵者仅仅在几小时内就攻破了舰队防线，洗劫这颗行星。行星防御部队守住了几座城市的内围防线，阻止了两次针对定居点的袭击，但战斗仍在继续。就连这里，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的宫殿，也变成了战场。”
languages.original_text: "Dargonus has been hit by a mass xenos attack. The fleet's resistance was broken in mere hours, then the invaders commenced a planetary raid. The planetary defence forces were able to hold the inner perimeters of several cities, two of the attacks were stifled on the approaches to settlements, but the fights continue — here as well, in the von Valancius palace."

traits.locale_text: “达戈努斯遭到了异形的大规模袭击。入侵者仅仅在几小时内就攻破了舰队防线，洗劫这颗行星。行星防御部队守住了几座城市的内围防线，阻止了两次针对定居点的袭击，但战斗仍在继续。就连这里，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的宫殿，也变成了战场。”

languages.text: «Dargonus ha sido objetivo de un ataque xenos inmenso. Atravesaron la flota defensiva en cuestión de horas y lanzaron una incursión contra el planeta. Las Fuerzas de Defensa Planetaria han logrado mantener los perímetros internos de varias ciudades y han rechazado dos de los ataques en su aproximación a los asentamientos, pero la batalla continúa... incluso aquí, en el palacio von Valancius».
languages.original_text: "Dargonus has been hit by a mass xenos attack. The fleet's resistance was broken in mere hours, then the invaders commenced a planetary raid. The planetary defence forces were able to hold the inner perimeters of several cities, two of the attacks were stifled on the approaches to settlements, but the fights continue — here as well, in the von Valancius palace."

traits.locale_text: «Dargonus ha sido objetivo de un ataque xenos inmenso. Atravesaron la flota defensiva en cuestión de horas y lanzaron una incursión contra el planeta. Las Fuerzas de Defensa Planetaria han logrado mantener los perímetros internos de varias ciudades y han rechazado dos de los ataques en su aproximación a los asentamientos, pero la batalla continúa... incluso aquí, en el palacio von Valancius».

languages.text: « Dargonus a subi une terrible attaque de xénos. La résistance opposée par la flotte a succombé en quelques heures seulement et les envahisseurs ont ensuite pris la planète d'assaut. Les Forces de Défense Planétaire sont parvenues à interrompre leur progression dans le périmètre intérieur de plusieurs villes et deux assauts ont été réprimés près de villages, mais les combats continuent là-bas et ici même, dans le palais des von Valancius. »
languages.original_text: "Dargonus has been hit by a mass xenos attack. The fleet's resistance was broken in mere hours, then the invaders commenced a planetary raid. The planetary defence forces were able to hold the inner perimeters of several cities, two of the attacks were stifled on the approaches to settlements, but the fights continue — here as well, in the von Valancius palace."

traits.locale_text: « Dargonus a subi une terrible attaque de xénos. La résistance opposée par la flotte a succombé en quelques heures seulement et les envahisseurs ont ensuite pris la planète d'assaut. Les Forces de Défense Planétaire sont parvenues à interrompre leur progression dans le périmètre intérieur de plusieurs villes et deux assauts ont été réprimés près de villages, mais les combats continuent là-bas et ici même, dans le palais des von Valancius. »

languages.text: "Dargonus wurde zum Opfer eines Xenos-Großangriffs. Der Widerstand der Flotte hielt nur wenige Stunden, dann haben die Invasoren den Planeten überfallen. Die Planetaren Verteidigungsstreitkräfte konnten die innere Verteidigung einiger Städte halten, zwei Angriffe kamen auf dem Weg zu Ansiedlungen zum Erliegen, aber die Kämpfe toben nach wie vor – hier und auch im Palast von Valancius."
languages.original_text: "Dargonus has been hit by a mass xenos attack. The fleet's resistance was broken in mere hours, then the invaders commenced a planetary raid. The planetary defence forces were able to hold the inner perimeters of several cities, two of the attacks were stifled on the approaches to settlements, but the fights continue — here as well, in the von Valancius palace."

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus wurde zum Opfer eines Xenos-Großangriffs. Der Widerstand der Flotte hielt nur wenige Stunden, dann haben die Invasoren den Planeten überfallen. Die Planetaren Verteidigungsstreitkräfte konnten die innere Verteidigung einiger Städte halten, zwei Angriffe kamen auf dem Weg zu Ansiedlungen zum Erliegen, aber die Kämpfe toben nach wie vor – hier und auch im Palast von Valancius."

languages.text: "Dragonus, topyekûn bir zeno saldırısına uğradı. Filonun direncini saatler içinde kırdılar, ardından gezegen çapında bir istilaya giriştiler. Gezegen savunma kuvvetleri, bazı şehirlerin iç kısımlarını tutabildi. Saldırılardan ikisini, yerleşim yerlerine yaklaşamadan püskürttük. Ancak burada, von Valancius sarayında dahi çatışmalar sürüyor."
languages.original_text: "Dargonus has been hit by a mass xenos attack. The fleet's resistance was broken in mere hours, then the invaders commenced a planetary raid. The planetary defence forces were able to hold the inner perimeters of several cities, two of the attacks were stifled on the approaches to settlements, but the fights continue — here as well, in the von Valancius palace."

traits.locale_text: "Dragonus, topyekûn bir zeno saldırısına uğradı. Filonun direncini saatler içinde kırdılar, ardından gezegen çapında bir istilaya giriştiler. Gezegen savunma kuvvetleri, bazı şehirlerin iç kısımlarını tutabildi. İki saldırıyı da yerleşim yerlerine yaklaşamadan püskürttük. Ancak burada, von Valancius sarayında dahi çatışmalar sürüyor."
